title: Drawing
medium: brush and wash, pen and ink on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: At center the Virgin standing while stretching her arm up to a flying angel.  At center right, Joseph looking down at two winged putti handing him a flower.  At center a couple, the woman holds baby Jesus on her lap and a man (monk) kneeling on a step in front of the child.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing.
brush and wash, pen and ink on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7280.
